title: 123B.85 DEFINITIONS.
text:
The following words and terms in sections 121A.585, 121A.59, 123B.84 to 123B.87, 123B.90, and 123B.91, shall have the following meanings ascribed to them.
"District" means any school district as defined in section 120A.05.
"School" means any school as defined in section 120A.22, subdivision 4.
"School board" means the governing body of any school district.
"School children" means any student or child attending or required to attend any school as provided in the Education Code, chapters 120A to 129C.
